main event: Observers watched a strange aircraft descending from above and making controlled maneuvers in Rocklin, California, on September 29, 1962.
interesting points: The object appeared to be a half-dome shape and was observed for approximately 30 minutes., The object silently hovered before moving off in different directions., The sighting did not provide sufficient data for evaluation., Witness reported that the object had bright orange-yellow colors., The object appeared to fade until hardly visible before reappearing.
sighted object: a strange aircraft of half-dome shape
witness description: A 17-year-old male, schoolteacher, who observes the object and reports the sighting to Project Blue Book.
